question: 質
sourceAnswer:
<read>しつ</read>:: quality/value | nature/inherent-quality/character | logical-quality
<read>たち</read>:: nature-(of-a-person)/disposition/temperament | nature-(of-something)/character/kind/sort

sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji.
